Text: Occupancy Permits for The RooseveltBill NonPrivilegedpst Hi All Just a quick update to let you know that we received Occupancy Permits from the City of Portland for the th floor at The Roosevelt May th at around pm We are now conducting Final Walk thrus for th floor and you will be contacted by Sarah Capps soon for your personal walk thru appointment We appreciate your patience If you have any additional questions please give us a call or an email Kirstin Boettcher for Jeff Burghart PC The Hasson Company Realtors Many of you have called for Chicago Title Contact information Chicago Title Micki Swenson Molly Kearney Assistant to Micki Swenson

Locked Storage The RooseveltBill NonPrivilegedpst Hi All Weve received several calls today regarding a locked storage door at The Roosevelt We only have keys to the front lobby door any condos that have not closed escrow yet If you have any troubles with Common Elements keys access codes etc your Property Mgmt Company is CMI Brad Atchley is the Community Mgr and can help you with these situations Please call Brad Atchley with any questions or needs at x Vancouver is and email is We hope you are enjoying your Roosevelt Condominium Kirstin Boettcher for Jeff Burghart PC The Hasson Company Realtors
